# Load Libraries
```{r message=FALSE}
library(glue)
library(here)
library(config)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Setup
```{r}
data_name <- "<data-name>"
```

# Read Data
```{r}
raw_data <- read_csv(here(config::get("raw_data_directory"), glue("{data_name}.csv")))
```

# Clean Data
```{r}
clean_data <- raw_data
```

# Write Data
```{r}
write_rds(clean_data, here("data", "clean", glue("{data_name}.rds")))
```
